title: Expert Course on Neonatal and Pediatric Medication Dosage Calculation

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic medical terminology and ability to perform simple mathematical calculations
context.additional_context: As managers, need to standardize medication administration procedures and enhance safety within teams

learning_goals: They can calculate neonatal/pediatric medication dosages based on weight and age with 95% accuracy.
They can resolve complex medication administration scenarios within three minutes using the mobile app Matymar V 1.0.
They can apply a five-step verification protocol in practice to prevent medication calculation errors.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
